item.title: Deep Dive: DLP Incidents, Alerts & Events - Part 1
item.description:
Correlation Analytics Prior to delving into the specifics, it is essential to understand that Microsoft Defender employs correlation analytics to aggregate related alerts and automated investigations from various products into a single incident. This comprehensive perspective enables security analysts to gain a clearer understanding of broader attack scenarios, facilitating more effective responses to complex threats across the organisation.
